name: Lightsaber training VR
description:
Are your lightsaber skills getting a bit rusty?
I've got a perfect solution. If you order now you can get professional Jedi (or Sith, we don't judge here...) training simulation right into your headset.

Hello guys,

I am Sir Fansi and I make a new VR game every week, so feel free to check this one out and let me know what you think! If you wanna keep up with what I am doing: https://www.instagram.com/sir_fansi/
